## ğŸ¯ Immediate Next Steps

### Option A: Test Bug Fixes (Recommended First)
```bash
# 1. Configure API key
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env and add GEMINI_API_KEY

# 2. Build packages
npm run build --workspaces

# 3. Run browser
npm start -w packages/shell

# 4. Test features:
#    - Multi-agent browsing
#    - Video intelligence
#    - AI commands
```

```bash

cd packages/smart-tabs

# 2. Start building core files:
#    - src/tab-manager.ts
#    - src/tab-classifier.ts
#    - src/session-manager.ts

# 3. Build and test
npm run build
```
